## Music

**Temengang**:

*'Temengang' is Kenyah for [Forest Rhinoceros Hornbill birds](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Rhinoceros_hornbill)*

`r embed_audio("audio/Temengang.mp3", attribute="controls")`

```{r, echo=FALSE, fig.align='center', out.width='50%'}
knitr::include_graphics("images/temengang.jpg")
```

**Maze**:

`r embed_audio("audio/Maze.mp3", attribute="controls")`

'Maze' is the second single off of Koleh's 'Songs From Upriver' EP.

```{r, echo=FALSE, fig.align='center', out.width='50%'}
knitr::include_graphics("images/maze_album_cover.png")
```
